description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Spicy Capsicum & Vegetable Toasties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Wheat free,Leftover vegetable,Sandwich press,Quick & easy lunch,Spinach,Peanut free
name: GlutenFree Spicy Capsicum & Vegetable Toasties Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven grill on high. Quarter capsicum, removing and discarding seeds and membrane.

Place capsicum, eggplant, and pumpkin in a bowl. Add oil, tossing to combine. Arrange capsicum on a baking tray in a single layer. Add remaining vegetables and grill, turning eggplant and pumpkin only, for 10 minutes. Grill for a further 7 minutes or until tender. Transfer capsicum to a snaplock bag and seal. Allow to sweat and cool for 10 minutes, before removing and discarding skin.

Place 2 slices of glutenfree bread on a flat surface. Spread each with spicy capsicum dip, then top with layers of grilled vegetables, spinach and bocconcini. Season, then sandwich with remaining gluten-free bread slices.
Preheat a sandwich press. Lightly spray sandwiches with oil. Place sandwiches in sandwich press and cook for 3 minutes or until golden and toasted. Serve.
